\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* three days' journey \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* waste land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* give \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w orders|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* said, \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w make|strong="H3513"\w* \w an|strong="H7971"\w* offering \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3513"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* waste land; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w very|strong="H1571"\w* far \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w make|strong="H3513"\w* prayer \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

And Moses said, When I go out from you I will make prayer to the Lord that the cloud of flies may go away from Pharaoh and from his people and from his servants tomorrow: only let Pharaoh no longer by deceit keep back the people from making their offering to the Lord.
Then Moses went out from Pharaoh and made prayer to the Lord.
And the Lord did as Moses said, and took away the cloud of flies from Pharaoh and from his servants and from his people; not one was to be seen.
But again Pharaoh made his heart hard and did not let the people go.
